original_text:
In her was found the blood of prophets and of God’s holy people,
    of all who have been slaughtered on the earth.”
korean_text: 선지자들과 성도들과 및 땅 위에서 죽임을 당한 모든 자의 피가 그 성 중에서 발견되었느니라 하더라

sentences.original_text: In her was found the blood of prophets

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 하나님의 거룩한 백성들의 피가 발견되었다

sentences.original_text: of all who have been slaughtered
